00011         MINE_SAN_MONA = 0,
00012             MINE_DRASSEN,

00014             MINE_CAMBRIA,
00015             MINE_CHITZENA,
00016             MINE_GRUMM,
00017       MAX_NUMBER_OF_MINES,
00018 };

00020 enum{
00021             MINER_FRED = 0,
00022             MINER_MATT,
00023             MINER_OSWALD,
00024             MINER_CALVIN,
00025             MINER_CARL,
00026       NUM_HEAD_MINERS,

00030 enum{
00031       SILVER_MINE=0,
00032       GOLD_MINE,
00033       NUM_MINE_TYPES,
00034 };
00035 
00036 
00037 // monster infestatation level, as percieved by the villagers
00038 enum{
00039       MINES_NO_MONSTERS = 0,   // nothing there at all
00040   MINES_TRACE_MONSTERS,    // monsters leave traces behind, but no one has seen them yet
00041       MINES_SOME_MONSTERS,           // there have been sightings but no one believes the witnesses
00042   MINES_MODERATE_MONSTERS, // scattered reports of monsters in lower levels, leaves workers uneasy
00043       MINES_HIGH_MONSTERS,           // workers know they are there and all but a few refuse to work
00044       MINES_RAMPANT_MONSTERS,  // the few that go down don't seem to return, no one wants to work period
00045       MINES_MONSTERS_SURFACE,  // monsters are coming out of the mines into the town looking for any edibles
00046 };
00047 
00048 // head miner quote types
00049 enum{
00050       HEAD_MINER_STRATEGIC_QUOTE_RUNNING_OUT = 0,
00051       HEAD_MINER_STRATEGIC_QUOTE_CREATURES_ATTACK,
00052       HEAD_MINER_STRATEGIC_QUOTE_CREATURES_GONE,
00053       HEAD_MINER_STRATEGIC_QUOTE_CREATURES_AGAIN,
00054       NUM_HEAD_MINER_STRATEGIC_QUOTES
00055 };

00058 
00059 // the strategic mine structures
00060 typedef struct MINE_LOCATION_TYPE
00061 {
00062       INT16    sSectorX;                                    // x value of sector mine is in
00063       INT16    sSectorY;                                    // y value of sector mine is in
00064       INT8     bAssociatedTown;                 // associated town of this mine
00065 
00066 } MINE_LOCATION_TYPE;
00067 
00068 typedef struct MINE_STATUS_TYPE
00069 {
00070       UINT8    ubMineType;                                              // type of mine (silver or gold)
00071       BYTE         filler1[3];
00072       UINT32   uiMaxRemovalRate;                            // fastest rate we can move ore from this mine in period
00073 
00074       UINT32   uiRemainingOreSupply;                  // the total value left to this mine (-1 means unlimited)
00075       UINT32   uiOreRunningOutPoint;                  // when supply drop below this, workers tell player the mine is running out of ore
00076 
00077       BOOLEAN  fEmpty;                                                        // whether no longer minable
00078       BOOLEAN  fRunningOut;                                             // whether mine is beginning to run out
00079       BOOLEAN  fWarnedOfRunningOut;                   // whether mine foreman has already told player the mine's running out
00080       BOOLEAN  fShutDownIsPermanent;                  // means will never produce again in the game (head miner was attacked & died/quit)
00081       BOOLEAN  fShutDown;                                                     // TRUE means mine production has been shut off
00082       BOOLEAN  fPrevInvadedByMonsters;          // whether or not mine has been previously invaded by monsters
00083       BOOLEAN  fSpokeToHeadMiner;                           // player doesn't receive income from mine without speaking to the head miner first
00084       BOOLEAN  fMineHasProducedForPlayer; // player has earned income from this mine at least once
00085 
00086       BOOLEAN  fQueenRetookProducingMine; // whether or not queen ever retook a mine after a player had produced from it
00087       BOOLEAN  fAttackedHeadMiner;                    // player has attacked the head miner, shutting down mine & decreasing loyalty
00088       UINT16       usValidDayCreaturesCanInfest; //Creatures will be permitted to spread if the game day is greater than this value.
00089       UINT32   uiTimePlayerProductionStarted;         // time in minutes when 'fMineHasProducedForPlayer' was first set
00090 
00091       BYTE     filler[11];                            // reserved for expansion
00092 
00093 } MINE_STATUS_TYPE;
00094 
00095 typedef struct HEAD_MINER_TYPE
00096 {
00097       UINT16      usProfileId;
00098       INT8        bQuoteNum[NUM_HEAD_MINER_STRATEGIC_QUOTES];
00099       UINT8       ubExternalFace;
00100 } HEAD_MINER_TYPE;
